Description: Available September 1st. One months broker fee applies! Sunny One Bedroom Condo for Rent. The unit offers a renovated kitchen with granite counters, maple cabinets, and Stainless Steel appliances with Garbage disposal and Dishwasher. Hardwood floors throughout the living area including in-unit Bosch washer/dryer and an oversized full bath. Additional private storage is located in the basement along with a landscaped common patio area. Pets NEGOTIABLE. Contact Cindy with Metro Realty Corp!
